definition: to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively

sentences.english: GABA is the major neurotransmitter involved in the globus pallidus.
sentences.chinese: GABA是苍白球主要的神经递质。

sentences.english: Each step involved in neurohumoral transmission represents a potential point of drug attack.
sentences.chinese: 神经递质传递中的每一步都可作为药物的潜在作用点。

sentences.english: These hormones in turn affect neurotransmitters, chemical messengers in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 这些激素反过来影响大脑里的神经递质，化学信使。

sentences.english: Aerobic exercise triggers the release of pleasure-inducing neurotransmitters in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 有氧运动能够触发大脑中快乐诱导神经递质的释放。

sentences.english: There is also a connection, as you have noted, between neurotransmitters and depression.
sentences.chinese: 如同人们已知的，神经递质与抑郁症也有关。

sentences.english: But the German researchers weren't looking at neurotransmitters.
sentences.chinese: 但是，德国研究人员没有看神经递质。

sentences.english: Glutamate is a fast excitatory transmitter in mammalian brains.
sentences.chinese: 卓敏谷氨酸是哺乳动物脑中的兴奋性递质。

sentences.english: Endorphines and enkephalins are names given to these neurotransmitters.
sentences.chinese: 内啡肽和脑啡肽类便是这类神经递质的名字。

sentences.english: Dopamine is the neurotransmitter in our brain that is intimately involved with feeling good.
sentences.chinese: 多巴胺是大脑中与好的感觉密切相关的神经递质。

sentences.english: Endorphines in turn are neurotransmitters that are chemically similar to morphine.1
sentences.chinese: 内啡肽在化学上类似吗啡，是一种神经递质。

sentences.english: Objective Determination of neurotransmitters and ascorbic acid for needle carbon fiber microelectrodes was reported.
sentences.chinese: 目的用自制的针式碳纤维微型传感器测定脑神经递质。

sentences.english: Dopamine (DA) is the most abundant catecholaminergic neurotransmitter in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 多巴胺是大脑中含量最丰富的儿茶酚胺类神经递质。

sentences.english: Aim To develop a HPLC method to determine monoamine and its metabolites in rat brain.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立大鼠脑内单胺递质及其代谢产物的测定方法。

sentences.english: Substance P(SP)has been considered as an importment mediator for Pain signaling.
sentences.chinese: 物质被认为是传递痛信息的重要神经递质或调质。

sentences.english: The relationship of dense core vesicle and some mediator was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文对大颗粒泡和某些递质的可能关系进行了讨论。

sentences.english: All drugs of abuse stimulate the release of the neurotransmitter dopamine.
sentences.chinese: 所有的药物滥用都刺激了神经递质多巴胺的释放。

definition: acetylcholine ACh (amine related to vitamin B complex)

pinyin: zhong1 shu1 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3
